column1: Veraval is a municipality and the headquarters of Gir Somnath district in the Indian state of Gujarat. It is 6 km from Somnath. It is also known for the hub of fishing industries in India.
Veraval was founded in 13th or 14th century by Rao Veravalji Vadher

Veraval is also the nearest town to the Gir National Park (42 km away).
